name: E-Commerce Full Fledged Website
description: It is an E-Commerce website for buying Vegetables. Here the customers can find fresh vegetables and also can order the vegetables at the market price.

name: Blog Rest API
description: It handles DB and server. Routes are Organized manner. Here all we can create, delete and some basic operation of the Blog management.

name: Movie Ticket Booking Website
description: In this Project I have made a website for movie ticket booking based on ReactJS. Here the customer can book his ticket using simple user-Interface.

name: Weather Condition
description: It shows the Weather Condition of Current Time. Here I create this with a very simple user-interface so that users can use it very easily.

name: Typing-Bubble-Game
description: Creative and Engaging game, this game focuses on improving typing speed and accuracy through interactive gameplay.

name: Simple and Interactive Clock
description: It is an Analog Clock which shows time, any developer can use this on his website by using the CDN link and can modify it.
